input.sentences: our little girl was energetic tonight .
she loves her papa the most and likes to sit with him .
the family dog was curious about the new toys .
she found a toy and she wanted to open it .
then she had a tea party with her aunt .
output.sentences: Tonight I spent my time babysitting my daughter.
She sit on papas lap for a short amount of time after playing.
The dog was snooping around the toys around the family.
The girl found the toy she was looking for.
There was a tea party and the aunt was invited.
